You're ready to start working with Webpack and Babel.
Edit this page on 
./dist/index.html

./src/styles/index.css

./src/index.js

Step-by-step for babel and webpack configuration:



- Create the project directory;

- Create a src directory;

- Inside src, create index.js (will be the webpack input) and a style directory for css. On index.js, import the css file;

- Create json file by initiating npm with terminal: npm init -y;

- Create node_modules directory by installing packages as dev dependencies with "npm i -D" plus packages:
webpack webpack-cli @babel/core @babel/preset-env babel-loader style-loader css-loader;

- Create files for babel (babel.config.js) and webpack (webpack.config.js) and set their configurations.
on the webpack config file, dont forget to set the 'mode' for 'development' or 'production';

- Use package.json file to insert custom script name "build" to run "webpack" package;

- Last, on terminal, use npm run build to execute the custom script and initialize webpack minification;

- Don't forget to include your 'index.min.js' minified file (now a bundle, the webpack output) on a 'index.html' file (generally inside dist directory created by webpack);
